description: Hairdressers and a range of other small businesses have reopened in Denmark.
title: Coronavirus: Rush for haircuts in Denmark as lockdown eases
title_page: Coronavirus: Rush for haircuts in Denmark as lockdown eases - BBC News
maintext: After a month without income, she is relieved to be open again. But she says not all customers are ready to come back. "Young people come. I have these [appointments]. Old people are not coming."
